description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Fish, Fennel, & Mango Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Fish, Fennel, & Mango Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bulb of fennel, trimmed and finely shredded
2 cloves garlic, grated or finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: First, make the dressing. Put all the ingredients in a small bowl or jug, and whisk together until well combined. Season with salt and black pepper.
Flake the mackerel into chunky pieces, and slice the trout into chunky strips. Arrange the fish on a platter, top with the fennel and mango slices, and scatter over the pomegranate seeds.
When ready to serve, drizzle over the dressing, and serve with slices of fresh wholemeal or other brown bread.
